briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of Netarsudil 0.02% Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Ripasudil Hydrochloride Hydrate 0.4% Ophthalmic Solution in Japanese Subjects With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
officialTitle: A Single-masked, Randomized, Multi-center, Parallel-group, 4-week Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Once Daily Netarsudil Ophthalmic Solution 0.02% Compared to Twice Daily Ripasudil Hydrochloride Hydrate Ophthalmic Solution 0.4% in Japanese Subjects With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma (POAG) or Ocular Hypertension (OHT)

arms.label: Netarsudil ophthalmic solution 0.02% and netarsudil ophthalmic solution vehicle

summary: A Phase 3 Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Netarsudil Ophthalmic Solution 0.02% QD to Ripasudil Hydrochloride Hydrate Ophthalmic Solution 0.4% BID, for Treatment of Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension Over A 4-Week Period.

effectByArm.arm: Netarsudil Ophthalmic Solution 0.02% and Netarsudil Ophthalmic Solution Vehicle
